subject: PRO X-P2-H2
description_text:
Hello simsonn I’m looking at buying the
PRO X-P2-H2 on the Simsonn official website and before I make the purchase
I have a couple of questions
1. is it available?
2. Are you able to send it France without any problems
3. And what is the warranty time on it ?
Thankyou very much for coming back to me
And hopefully I can make the purchase soon
Stephan

conversations.body_text: Hi Stephan Le Roux,  We can ship to France, and we already have many customers there. Our products come with a 2-year warranty. We also offer vibration feedback motors.
And it is available?  these specific PRO X-P2-H2?

And how much would the rumble motor cost pre installed ?

On Wed 9 Jul 2025 at 13:54, Stephan Le Roux <lerouxstephan003@gmail.com>
wrote:

> And it is available?  these specific PRO X-P2-H2?
>
> On Wed 9 Jul 2025 at 13:51, service@simsonn.com
Thankyou for coming back to me looking forward to buy the product only if it’s available:)
Is the simsonn PRO X ultra  P2-H-2 available and ready to be shipped to France ?

Hi Stephan Le Roux,  I just checked with our operations team — the Pro X Ultra is in stock at our Germany warehouse. You can place your order directly on our official website, and it will be shipped from Germany without any customs duties.   https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-sim-pedal-pro-x-ultra         If you're also interested in the vibration motors, here is the purchase link for your reference.      https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor

Hello so I have ordered the PRO X ultra P2-H2 today , and I chose the
express delivery option.
Will the delivery time be accurate if it said between 3-7 business days ?
If you need a confirmation number I can provide that as well
Thankyou
On Thu 10 Jul 2025 at 05:40, service@simsonn.com
Hi Stephan Le Roux,  Please provide your order number, and I’ll check it for you right away.

The order number is
Order #SSN1976
Thankyou very much .

On Sat 12 Jul 2025 at 06:39, service@simsonn.com

Hi Stephan Le Roux,     Here's a link to your logistic tracking, shipped from a German warehouse, has arrived in France and is expected to be delivered for you in the next two days. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=CE326618876DE
